name: GOODNIGHTRandomSleepMessagesSpokenBeforeBed
0:
”Alexa, open good night.”
”Alexa, start good night.”
”Alexa, launch good night.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: good night
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Say goodnight to your smart home assistants and have her reply back with a good night message to wish you a restful nights sleep, get a different goodnight reply each time.

Checkout the I'M HOME skill from SIMEON TUITT DIRECT that greets you when you get Home after you have had time to use this GOODNIGHT skill.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
